wore a ring, he made the sign of the cross over him with a gesture evidently habitual, of- fering his puffy cheek, but Bagrati6n kissed him on the neck instead. 
"Christ be with you!" Kutuzov repeated and went toward his carriage. "Get in with me," said he to Bolk6nski. 
"Your excellency, I should like to be of use here. Allow me to remain with Prince Bagra- ti6n's detachment."
